name: Alpine Shop
summary: Alpine Shop is a family-owned business with a staff whose knowledge and tenure is second to none. Whether you’ve been a customer for 40 years or are just stopping in for the first time, we look forward to assisting you with your outdoor needs.

name: Meadowbrook of Sandpoint
summary: Visit our store in downtown Sandpoint, Idaho and see a timeless selection of unique and affordable gifts, home decor and furnishings.

name: Azalea Handpicked Style
summary: Consignment and gift boutique in downtown Sandpoint Idaho, specializing in men’s and women’s quality resale clothing and small-batch, sustainable goods.

name: Winter Ridge Natural Foods
summary: Winter Ridge Natural Foods Market is the largest natural foods store in the two northernmost counties of Idaho. It is located in the heart of Sandpoint and only blocks away from beautiful Lake Pend Oreille.

name: Zero Point
summary: We are here to support your journey through life by offering products to help your soul prosper, grow your peace, cultivate wisdom, and share in life's abundant delights!
